message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product. It's a game-changer in its industry and has the potential to revolutionize the way people work. I think it's worth every penny of its value to me, which is $15000. I'm willing to make a one-time exception and offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of a price of $11000. It's a fair compromise that still reflects the product's value to me. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $11000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Can you consider that?

I understand that $9500 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm thinking of a price of $10800. It's a bit higher than my original offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but $10800 is still a bit too high. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9800. Can you consider that?

I understand that $9800 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm thinking of a price of $10500. It's a bit higher than my previous offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but $10500 is still a bit too high. I'm starting to think that we're getting close to the lowest price you're willing to accept. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Can you consider that?

I understand that $9500 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm thinking of a price of $10200. It's a bit higher than my previous offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway one more time, but $10200 is still a bit too high. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me at this price. Can you consider that?
